sections.title: Declarations
sections.text:
Policy Number: TEST-12345
Named Insured: ABC Corporation
Policy Period: 01/01/2025 to 01/01/2026
Limits of Insurance: $1,000,000 Each Occurrence

elements.text: Policy Number: TEST-12345
elements.explanation: The element defines the term 'Policy Number' used in the policy.
elements.function: Identifies the unique identifier assigned to the insurance policy.

elements.text: Named Insured: ABC Corporation
elements.explanation: The element identifies the named insured, which is the entity or person covered by the insurance policy. (Corrected invalid type)
elements.function: To specify the entity or person that is the primary insured party under the policy.

elements.text: Policy Period: 01/01/2025 to 01/01/2026
elements.explanation: The element establishes the specific time period during which the policy is in effect, indicating the start and end dates.
elements.function: Defines the duration of coverage provided by the insurance policy

elements.text: Limits of Insurance: $1,000,000 Each Occurrence
elements.explanation: This element specifies a sub-limit of $1,000,000 for each occurrence within the broader coverage.
elements.function: To establish the maximum amount the insurer will pay for each separate occurrence of a covered loss.

sections.title: ENDORSEMENT - ADDITIONAL INSURED
sections.text:
This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following:
COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART

SCHEDULE
Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s):
XYZ Partner Company

Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

elements.text: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.
elements.explanation: The element expands the coverage to include additional insured parties specified in the Schedule.
elements.function: This element modifies Section II of the policy to extend coverage to additional insured parties listed in the Schedule.

sections.title: SECTION I - INSURING AGREEMENT
sections.text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of "bodily injury" or "property damage" to which this insurance applies. We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any "suit" seeking those damages. However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any "suit" seeking damages for "bodily injury" or "property damage" to which this insurance does not apply.

elements.text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.
elements.explanation: The element provides coverage for damages the insured becomes legally obligated to pay due to bodily injury or property damage.
elements.function: Specifies the scope of coverage provided by the insurance policy in terms of liability for bodily injury or property damage.

elements.text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
elements.explanation: This element provides coverage by granting the insurer the right and duty to defend the insured in case of a 'suit' seeking damages.
elements.function: To ensure that the insured is provided with legal defense in case of a lawsuit seeking damages.

elements.text: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.
elements.explanation: This element explicitly states that the insurer has no duty to defend the insured in certain situations, which falls under the category of exclusions.
elements.function: Excludes coverage for defending the insured in certain situations where the insurance does not apply

dependencies.explanation: The Exclusion element's application depends on the Coverage Grant element

sections.title: SECTION II - EXCLUSIONS
sections.text:
This insurance does not apply to:
1. Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
2. Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.

elements.text:
Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.
elements.explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.
elements.function: To exclude coverage for intentional harm caused by the insured.

elements.text:
Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.
elements.explanation: The element explicitly removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage arising from assumed liability in a contract or agreement.
elements.function: To exclude coverage for liabilities assumed by the insured under contracts or agreements.

sections.title: SECTION III - DEFINITIONS
sections.text:
1. "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.
2. "Property damage" means:
   a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
   b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

elements.text: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.
elements.explanation: The element provides a general definition of 'Bodily injury' within the policy.
elements.function: To clarify the scope of bodily injury covered under the policy.

elements.text:
"Property damage" means:
a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.
elements.explanation: The element 'Property damage' is clearly defining the term for the purposes of the insurance policy.
elements.function: To establish the meaning of 'Property damage' within the context of the policy.

sections.title: SECTION IV - CONDITIONS
sections.text:
1. Bankruptcy
Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.
2. Duties In The Event Of Occurrence, Offense, Claim Or Suit
a. You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an "occurrence" or an offense which may result in a claim.

elements.text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.
elements.explanation: This element establishes a condition that the bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or their estate will not relieve the insurer of their obligations under the policy.
elements.function: Ensures that the insurer remains obligated to fulfill the terms of the policy even in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

elements.text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

conditions: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

elements.explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insured to notify the insurer of an 'occurrence' or offense that may result in a claim.
elements.function: To ensure timely reporting of potential claims to the insurer.

elements_with_language_analysis.function: To ensure that the insurer remains obligated to fulfill the terms of the policy even in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

intent_details.what_is_covered: Obligations of the insurance company under the policy
intent_details.actor_obligations: The insurance company must fulfill its obligations under the policy regardless of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

conditions.condition_text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate
conditions.effect: Removes coverage in case of bankruptcy or insolvency
conditions.consequence: Will not relieve the insurer of their obligations

extracted_terms.context: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate
extracted_terms.significance: Activation of coverage despite bankruptcy or insolvency

extracted_terms.context: our obligations under this policy
extracted_terms.significance: Requirement for the insurer to fulfill obligations regardless of bankruptcy or insolvency

elements_with_language_analysis.text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

conditions: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

elements_with_language_analysis.explanation: This element establishes a requirement for the insured to notify the insurer of an 'occurrence' or offense that may result in a claim, indicating a reporting obligation.
elements_with_language_analysis.function: To ensure timely reporting of potential claims to the insurer for proper handling and investigation.

intent_analysis.intent_summary: Policyholder must promptly notify the insurer of any potential claim arising from an occurrence or offense.

intent_details.temporal_conditions: Notification must be made as soon as practicable
intent_details.actor_obligations: Policyholder must notify the insurer promptly

conditions.condition_text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.
conditions.effect: Requirement for reporting claims or incidents
conditions.consequence: Coverage may be affected if not reported promptly

extracted_terms.context: an 'occurrence'
extracted_terms.significance: This term refers to an event that may result in a claim

extracted_terms.context: an offense
extracted_terms.significance: This term refers to a violation that may result in a claim

extracted_terms.context: result in a claim
extracted_terms.significance: Refers to a demand for coverage or compensation

extracted_terms.context: as soon as practicable
extracted_terms.significance: Requires prompt notification to the insurer

coverage_grants.intent_summary: This element identifies ABC Corporation as the named insured on the insurance policy.

details.what_is_covered: ABC Corporation as the insured party
details.temporal_conditions: Applies for the duration of the policy term
details.actor_obligations: ABC Corporation must comply with the terms and conditions of the policy

coverage_grants.intent_summary: This element designates XYZ Partner Company as an additional insured party under the insurance policy.

details.what_is_covered: Liability coverage for XYZ Partner Company
details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies for the duration of the policy term
details.spatial_conditions: Coverage applies wherever the policy is valid
details.actor_obligations: XYZ Partner Company must meet any requirements specified in the policy for coverage to apply

coverage_grants.intent_summary: This element extends coverage to additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule.

details.what_is_covered: Additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule
details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies as long as the additional insured status is in effect
details.actor_obligations: The insurer must recognize the additional insured status as per the Schedule

coverage_grants.intent_summary: Promises to pay for covered damages or losses
This element ensures that the insurance company's obligations under the policy will not be relieved in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

details.what_is_covered: Obligations of the insurance company under the policy
details.actor_obligations: The insurance company must fulfill its obligations under the policy regardless of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

key_exclusions.intent_summary: This element excludes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.
This exclusion pertains to bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages due to assuming liability in a contract or agreement.

trigger_events: Assumption of liability in a contract or agreement
details.actor_obligations: The insured must be obligated to pay damages by reason of assuming liability in a contract or agreement for this exclusion to apply.

key_limitations.intent_summary: This element sets the monetary limit of insurance coverage for each occurrence to $1,000,000.

trigger_events: Occurrence of an event triggering insurance coverage
details.temporal_conditions: Coverage applies to each separate occurrence

key_limitations.intent_summary: This element states that the insurance company has no obligation to defend the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages for bodily injury or property damage that is not covered by the insurance policy.

trigger_events: 'Suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'
details.actor_obligations: The insurance company is not obligated to defend the insured in lawsuits for damages not covered by the policy.

key_conditions.effect: Coverage applies only to ABC Corporation
key_conditions.consequence: Coverage does not apply if the named insured is not ABC Corporation

key_conditions.condition_text: This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART
key_conditions.consequence: Coverage will only be provided as modified by this endorsement

key_conditions.condition_text: Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s): XYZ Partner Company
key_conditions.effect: Must be named as an additional insured for coverage to apply
key_conditions.consequence: Coverage will not apply if XYZ Partner Company is not named as an additional insured

key_conditions.condition_text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.
key_conditions.effect: Requirement for reporting claims or incidents
key_conditions.consequence: Coverage may be affected if not reported promptly

key_conditions.effect: Defines the time period during which the policy is in effect
key_conditions.consequence: Coverage only applies between the specified dates

time_conditions.effect: Defines the time period during which the policy is in effect
time_conditions.consequence: Coverage only applies between the specified dates

DEFINES_TERM.intent_summary: Policy Number is a unique identifier assigned to a specific insurance policy.
This element defines the time period during which the insurance policy is in effect.
Defines the term 'bodily injury' for interpreting policy coverage
This element defines 'property damage' as physical injury to tangible property or loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

GRANTS_COVERAGE.intent_summary: This element identifies ABC Corporation as the named insured on the insurance policy.
This element designates XYZ Partner Company as an additional insured party under the insurance policy.
This element extends coverage to additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule.
Promises to pay for covered damages or losses
This element ensures that the insurance company's obligations under the policy will not be relieved in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

LIMITS_COVERAGE.intent_summary: This element sets the monetary limit of insurance coverage for each occurrence to $1,000,000.
This element states that the insurance company has no obligation to defend the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages for bodily injury or property damage that is not covered by the insurance policy.

MODIFIES_COVERAGE.intent_summary: This element modifies the insurance coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part.

IMPOSES_OBLIGATION.intent_summary: The insurance company has the right and duty to defend the insured in any legal action seeking damages.
Policyholder must promptly notify the insurer of any potential claim arising from an occurrence or offense.

EXCLUDES_COVERAGE.intent_summary: This element excludes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.
This exclusion pertains to bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages due to assuming liability in a contract or agreement.

PREREQUISITE.effect: Coverage applies only to ABC Corporation

PREREQUISITE.condition_text: This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART
Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s): XYZ Partner Company
PREREQUISITE.effect: Must be named as an additional insured for coverage to apply

PREREQUISITE.condition_text: the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule
PREREQUISITE.effect: Expands coverage to include additional insured parties

PREREQUISITE.condition_text: the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies
PREREQUISITE.effect: Coverage only applies if the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages for bodily injury or property damage

PREREQUISITE.condition_text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.
PREREQUISITE.effect: Modifies coverage by specifying the insurer's duty to defend the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages

PREREQUISITE.condition_text: Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property
PREREQUISITE.effect: Must be met for coverage to apply

TIMING.effect: Defines the time period during which the policy is in effect

LIMITATION.effect: Limits the coverage to $1,000,000 per occurrence

LIMITATION.condition_text: sickness or disease sustained by a person
death resulting from any of these at any time
Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured

EXCLUSIONARY.effect: Removes coverage for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage'

EXCLUSIONARY.condition_text: "Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured
EXCLUSIONARY.effect: Removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured

EXCLUSIONARY.condition_text: "Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement
EXCLUSIONARY.effect: Removes coverage for bodily injury or property damage resulting from assuming liability in a contract or agreement

EXCLUSIONARY.condition_text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate
EXCLUSIONARY.effect: Removes coverage in case of bankruptcy or insolvency

REPORTING.condition_text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.
REPORTING.effect: Requirement for reporting claims or incidents

intent.intent_summary: Policy Number is a unique identifier assigned to a specific insurance policy.
This element identifies ABC Corporation as the named insured on the insurance policy.
This element defines the time period during which the insurance policy is in effect.
This element sets the monetary limit of insurance coverage for each occurrence to $1,000,000.

nodes.text: This endorsement modifies insurance provided under the following: COMMERCIAL GENERAL LIABILITY COVERAGE PART

intent.intent_summary: This element modifies the insurance coverage provided under the Commercial General Liability Coverage Part.

nodes.text: SCHEDULE Name of Additional Insured Person(s) Or Organization(s): XYZ Partner Company

intent.intent_summary: This element designates XYZ Partner Company as an additional insured party under the insurance policy.

nodes.text: Section II – Who Is An Insured is amended to include as an additional insured the person(s) or organization(s) shown in the Schedule.

intent.intent_summary: This element extends coverage to additional insured persons or organizations listed in the Schedule.

nodes.text: We will pay those sums that the insured becomes legally obligated to pay as damages because of 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance applies.

intent.intent_summary: Promises to pay for covered damages or losses

nodes.text: We will have the right and duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking those damages.

intent.intent_summary: The insurance company has the right and duty to defend the insured in any legal action seeking damages.

nodes.text: However, we will have no duty to defend the insured against any 'suit' seeking damages for 'bodily injury' or 'property damage' to which this insurance does not apply.

intent.intent_summary: This element states that the insurance company has no obligation to defend the insured in a lawsuit seeking damages for bodily injury or property damage that is not covered by the insurance policy.

nodes.text:
Expected or Intended Injury
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" expected or intended from the standpoint of the insured.

intent.intent_summary: This element excludes coverage for bodily injury or property damage that is expected or intended by the insured.

nodes.text:
Contractual Liability
"Bodily injury" or "property damage" for which the insured is obligated to pay damages by reason of the assumption of liability in a contract or agreement.

intent.intent_summary: This exclusion pertains to bodily injury or property damage for which the insured is obligated to pay damages due to assuming liability in a contract or agreement.

nodes.text: "Bodily injury" means bodily injury, sickness or disease sustained by a person, including death resulting from any of these at any time.

intent.intent_summary: Defines the term 'bodily injury' for interpreting policy coverage

nodes.text:
"Property damage" means:
a. Physical injury to tangible property, including all resulting loss of use of that property; or
b. Loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

intent.intent_summary: This element defines 'property damage' as physical injury to tangible property or loss of use of tangible property that is not physically injured.

nodes.text: Bankruptcy or insolvency of the insured or of the insured's estate will not relieve us of our obligations under this policy.

intent.intent_summary: This element ensures that the insurance company's obligations under the policy will not be relieved in the event of the insured's bankruptcy or insolvency.

nodes.text: You must see to it that we are notified as soon as practicable of an 'occurrence' or an offense which may result in a claim.

intent.intent_summary: Policyholder must promptly notify the insurer of any potential claim arising from an occurrence or offense.
